name: Nilay
description:
Nilay is the greatest tightrope elephant walker there ever was! People from all around the world come to the Animals Can't Feel Circus to see her.

But when the show is over and the crowd leaves, animals are tortured if they didn't amuse the humans or follow orders. Nilay has had enough of this and now she has decided to escape.  Now she will find out where she really comes from.

Balance Nilay and avoid falling from the rope, as you walk forward.

Controls:

  • A and D to walk
  • Mouse to balance

Try not to fall!

Code and art by: Manuel Varela
Music by: Nelson Moraga
